name: Guzzy Sandbox
description:
This is a remake of a sandbox game I made in May last year. I was still getting used to GMS2 at the time, but now that it's been a year I think I can tackle it again. Here's the link to the original game if you're interested: https://libdevv.itch.io/gedit

---CONTROLS---

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - Spawn and drag stuff. Click something to drag it and then click again to put it down.

RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON - Delete stuff.

---FEATURES---

funny small people with top hats that are forced to succumb to your torture and mask their fright and dismay with bubbly happiness and willingness.

also the ground actually snaps to the grid now :D

---BUGS---

The wuzzy (the guy who walks) has better collision than last time, but it's still a bit buggy.

You can select/delete multiple things at a time.
